translation.en: [Mike] Something is coming. Something hungry for blood.
translation.it: Qualcosa si avvicina. È assetato di sangue.

translation.en: A shadow grows on the wall behind you, swallowing you in darkness.
translation.it: Sul muro dietro di voi inizia a stagliarsi un'ombra, che vi inghiotte piano piano.

translation.en: -It is almost here. -What is it?
translation.it: - Il rumore si avvicina sempre più. - Cos'è?

translation.en: What if it's the Demogorgon?
Oh, Jesus, we're so screwed if it's the Demogorgon.
It's not the Demogorgon.
An army of troglodytes charge into the chamber!
translation.it: Un nugolo di trogloditi piomba nella caverna!

translation.en: -Troglodytes? -Told ya. [chuckling]
[softly] Wait a minute.
Did you hear that?
That... that sound?
That didn't come from the troglodytes. No, that... That came from something else.
translation.it: Non viene dai trogloditi. No, a farlo è qualcos'altro.

translation.en: -The Demogorgon! -[all groaning]
-We're in deep shit. -Will, your action!
-I don't know! -Fireball him!
I'd have to roll a 13 or higher!
Too risky. Cast a protection spell.
translation.it: Rischioso. Fai un incantesimo di protezione.

translation.en: -Don't be a pussy. Fireball him! -Cast Protection.
The Demogorgon is tired of your silly human bickering!
translation.it: Il Demogorgone è stanco di stupidi battibecchi tra umani!

translation.en: It stomps towards you. -Boom! -Fireball him!
translation.it: - Si avvicina a grandi passi. - Palla di fuoco!

translation.en: -Another stomp, boom! -Cast Protection.
translation.it: - Un altro passo! - Incantesimo di protezione.

translation.en: -He roars in anger! -[all clamoring]
-Fireball! -[die clattering]
-Oh, shit! -[Lucas] Where'd it go?
[Lucas] Where is it? [Will] I don't know!
translation.it: - Che fine ha fatto? - Non lo so!

translation.en: -Is it a 13? -[Will] I don't know!
[Lucas] Where is it? [Dustin] Oh, my God!
[Karen] Mike! [Dustin] Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
[Karen] Mike! [Lucas] Can you find it yet?
[Will] No, I can't find it!
-Mike! -[Dustin] Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
Mom, we're in the middle of a campaign!
translation.it: Siamo nel bel mezzo di una campagna!

translation.en: You mean the end? Fifteen after.
translation.it: No, alla fine. Avete già sforato di 15 minuti.

translation.en: [Lucas] Oh, my God! Freaking idiot! [Will] Why do we have to go?
-Mom, wait, just 20 more minutes! -It's a school night, Michael.
translation.it: - Mamma, solo altri 20 minuti! - Domani c'è scuola.

translation.en: I just put Holly to bed. You can finish next weekend.
translation.it: Holly è già a letto. Finirete il prossimo week-end.

translation.en: -But that'll ruin the flow! -Michael--
I'm serious, Mom.
The campaign took two weeks to plan.
translation.it: Ci ho messo due settimane a pianificare la campagna.

translation.en: How was I supposed to know it was gonna take ten hours?
translation.it: Non sapevo che sarebbe durata dieci ore!

translation.en: You've been playing for ten hours?
-Dad, don't you think that 20 more-- -I think you should listen to your mother.
translation.it: - Papà, non pensi che altri 20 minuti... - Ascolta tua madre.

translation.en: -[static crackling on TV] -[grunts] Dang dumb piece of junk.
[Will] Oh, I got it!
-Does the seven count? -It was a seven?
translation.it: - Questo sette conta? - Era un sette?

translation.en: Did Mike see it? Then it doesn't count.
translation.it: Mike l'ha visto? Allora non conta.

translation.en: [Dustin] Yo, hey, guys.
-Does anyone want this? -[both] No.
No, I don't think...
Yeah, he's cute.
Barb, no, I don't think so.
-Barb, you're not-- -Hey, Nancy.
There's a slice left if you want it.
translation.it: Ne è rimasta una fetta, se vuoi.

translation.en: -Sausage and pepperoni! -Hold on.
-There's something wrong with your sister. -What are you talking about?
translation.it: - Tua sorella ha qualcosa che non va. - Che vuoi dire?

translation.en: -She's got a stick up her butt. -[Lucas] Yeah.
translation.it: - Se la tira da morire. - Già.

translation.en: It's because she's been dating that douchebag, Steve Harrington.
translation.it: Perché esce con quella testa di cazzo di Steve Harrington.

translation.en: [Dustin] Yeah, she's turning into a real jerk.
She's always been a real jerk.
Nuh-uh, she used to be cool.
Like that time she dressed up as an elf for our Elder tree campaign.
translation.it: Si è vestita da elfo per la nostra campagna del Sambuco.

translation.en: [Mike] Four years ago!
[Dustin] Just saying. [Lucas] Later.
-It was a seven. -Huh?
The roll, it was a seven.
translation.it: Con il dado. È uscito sette.

translation.en: The Demogorgon, it got me.
[grunts] See you tomorrow.
[Lucas] Good night, ladies. [Dustin] Kiss your mom 'night for me.
translation.it: - Buonanotte, ragazze. - Dai un bacio a tua madre da parte mia.

translation.en: Race you back to my place? Winner gets a comic.
translation.it: Gara fino a casa mia? Ci giochiamo un fumetto.

translation.en: -Any comic? -Yeah.
I didn't say "go"!
Get back here!
I'm gonna kill you!
[Will] I'll take your X-Men 134!
Son of a bitch.
Mom?
-Jonathan? Mom? -[barking continues]
-Hello? Hello? -[static crackling]
[woman on TV] And that's it for News Center this morning.
Thanks for joining us.
Let's hand off now to Liz at the news desk.
[Liz] All right, thank you, Donna. Turning now to local news,
we're getting reports of surges and power outages all across the county.
translation.it: Nella contea si sono verificati sovraccarichi e interruzioni di corrente.

translation.en: Last night, hundreds of homes in East Hawkins were affected,
translation.it: Ieri sera, a East Hawkins, centinaia di case

translation.en: leaving many residents in the dark.
The cause of the outage is still unknown.
We reached out to Roane County Water and Electric,
translation.it: La Società idroelettrica della contea di Roane

translation.en: and a spokesperson says that they are confident
translation.it: ha dichiarato che l'elettricità sarà sicuramente ripristinata ovunque

translation.en: power will be restored to all remaining homes
translation.it: che l'elettricità sarà sicuramente ripristinata ovunque

translation.en: within the next several hours.
In other news, you might wanna stay home tonight
translation.it: Le altre notizie. Restate a casa stasera

translation.en: or at least pack an umbrella.
We turn to everybody's favorite morning weather guy, Charles.
translation.it: Ascoltiamo Charles, il nostro meteorologo preferito.

translation.en: [Joyce] Where the hell are they?
-Jonathan? -Check the couch!
Ugh, I did.
Oh... Got them.
Okay, sweetie, I will see you tonight.
translation.it: Va bene, tesoro. Ci vediamo stasera.

translation.en: -Yeah, see you later. -Where's Will?
Oh, I didn't get him up yet. -He's probably still sleeping. -[sighs]
translation.it: Non l'ho ancora svegliato. Starà dormendo.

translation.en: -Jonathan, you have to make sure he's up! -Mom, I'm making breakfast.
translation.it: - Devi assicurarti che sia sveglio! - Sto preparando la colazione.

translation.en: I told you this a thousand times.
Will! Come on, honey. It's time to get up.
translation.it: Will! Forza, tesoro. È ora di alzarsi.

translation.en: -He came home last night, right? -He's not in his room?
translation.it: - È tornato a casa ieri sera, vero? - Non è nella sua stanza?

translation.en: -Did he come home or not? -I don't know.
translation.it: - È tornato o no? - Non lo so.

translation.en: -You don't know? -No.
[stammering] I got home late. I was working. You were working?
translation.it: - Sono tornato tardi. Ero al lavoro. - Al lavoro?

translation.en: Eric asked if I could cover. I said yeah.
translation.it: Eric mi ha chiesto di coprire un turno.

translation.en: I just thought we could use the extra cash.
translation.it: Qualche soldo in più ci fa comodo.

translation.en: -Jonathan, we've talked about this. -I know, I know.
translation.it: - Jonathan, ne abbiamo già discusso. - Lo so.

translation.en: You can't take shifts when I'm working.
translation.it: Non puoi accettare turni extra quando lavoro.

translation.en: Mom, it's not a big deal. Look, he was at the Wheelers' all day.
translation.it: Tranquilla. Will è stato tutto il giorno dai Wheeler.

translation.en: -I'm sure he just stayed over. -[sighs] I can't believe you.
translation.it: - Sarà rimasto a dormire lì. - Sei incredibile.

translation.en: I can't believe you sometimes.
translation.it: A volte mi lasci senza parole.

translation.en: -[phone ringing] -That's disgusting.
-[Mike] You're disgusting! -Hello?
Hi, Karen. It's Joyce.
-[Karen] Oh, Joyce, hi. -What the hell, Mike?
translation.it: - Ciao, Joyce. - Che cazzo fai, Mike?

translation.en: -[Ted] Hey! -Quiet!
-Language. -Are you kidding?
Was that Will I heard back there?
Will? No, no, no, it's just Mike.
Will didn't spend the night?
translation.it: Will non ha dormito da voi?

translation.en: [Karen] No, he left here a little bit after 8:00.
translation.it: No, se n'è andato poco dopo le 20:00.

translation.en: Why? He's not home?
Um, you know what? I think he just left early for... for school.
translation.it: Sarà uscito presto per andare a scuola.

translation.en: -Thank you so much. Bye. -Okay. Bye.
That's weird. I don't see him.
[Lucas] I'm telling you, his mom's right.
translation.it: Per me, ha ragione sua madre.

translation.en: He probably just went to class early again.
translation.it: Sarà arrivato di nuovo in anticipo.

translation.en: Yeah, he's always paranoid Gursky's gonna give him another pop quiz.
translation.it: Ha il terrore dei test a sorpresa di Gursky.

translation.en: Step right up, ladies and gentlemen.
Step right up and get your tickets for the freak show.
translation.it: E acquistate un biglietto per lo spettacolo dei mostri.

translation.en: Who do you think would make more money in a freak show?
translation.it: Secondo te, chi guadagnerebbe di più esibendosi?

translation.en: Midnight, Frogface, or Toothless?
[mimicking Dustin] I'd go with Toothless.
I told you a million times, my teeth are coming in.
translation.it: Te l'ho detto un milione di volte: i denti mi spunteranno con calma.

translation.en: It's called cleidocranial dysplasia.
[mimicking Dustin] "I told you a million times."
translation.it: "Te l'ho detto un milione di volte."

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Do the arm thing.
translation.it: Fai quella cosa con le braccia.

translation.en: Do it, freak!
[Troy] God, it gets me every time.
translation.it: Oddio, mi fa senso tutte le volte.

translation.en: -Assholes. -[Mike] I think it's kinda cool.
It's like you have superpowers or something.
translation.it: È come se tu avessi dei superpoteri.

translation.en: Like Mr. Fantastic.
[Dustin] Yeah, except I can't fight evil with it.
translation.it: Solo che sono poteri inutili per combattere il male.

translation.en: [Barbara] So, did he call?
Keep your voice down.
Did he?
I told you, it's not like that.
translation.it: Te l'ho detto. Non è come pensi.

translation.en: Okay, I mean, yes, he likes me, but not like that.
translation.it: Sì, gli piaccio, ma non in quel senso.

translation.en: We just...
made out a couple times.
"We just... made out a couple times."
translation.it: "Ci siamo solo... baciati un paio di volte."

translation.en: Nance, seriously,
you're gonna be so cool now, it's ridiculous.
translation.it: Stai per diventare popolare da morire.

translation.en: No, I'm not.
You better still hang out with me, that's all I'm saying.
translation.it: Voglio solo dire che vorrei che continuassi a frequentarmi.

translation.en: If you become friends with Tommy H. or Carol--
translation.it: Se diventi amica di Tommy H. o di Carol...

translation.en: Oh, that's gross!
Okay, I'm telling you, it was a one-time...
translation.it: Te lo ripeto. È successo solo una volta...

translation.en: -Two-time thing. -[chuckles]
You were saying?
-Steve... -Mmm-hmm?
-I have to go. -In a minute.
Steve. I really, like...
Seriously, I have to go.
Wait, wait, wait. Let's...
Come on, let's do something tonight, yeah?
Uh... No, I can't. I have to study for Kaminsky's test.
translation.it: No. Devo studiare per il compito di Kaminsky.

translation.en: Oh, come on. What's your GPA again? 3.999...
translation.it: Ma dai! Prendi sempre il massimo dei voti.

translation.en: Kaminsky's tests are impossible.
translation.it: I compiti di Kaminsky sono difficili.

translation.en: -Well, then, just let me help. -You failed chem.
translation.it: - Ti aiuto io. - Sei andato male in chimica.

translation.en: -C-minus. -Well, in that case...
translation.it: - Ho preso un sei meno. - In tal caso...

translation.en: So I'll be over around, say, like, 8:00?
translation.it: Vengo a casa tua verso le 20:00?

translation.en: -Are you crazy? My mom would not-- -I'll climb through your window.
translation.it: - Sei matto? Mia madre non... - Entrerò dalla finestra.

translation.en: She won't even know I'm there. I'm stealthy, like a ninja.
translation.it: Tua madre non mi vedrà. So essere un vero ninja.

translation.en: You are crazy.
Wait, wait, wait. Just... Okay, forget about that.
We can just...
We can just, like, chill in my car.
translation.it: ...se invece facessimo un giro con la mia auto?

translation.en: We can find a nice quiet place to park, and...
translation.it: Potremmo parcheggiare in un posto tranquillo e...

translation.en: Steve... I have to study.
I'm not kidding.
Well, why do you think I want it to be nice and quiet?
translation.it: Perché pensi che voglia trovare un posto tranquillo?

translation.en: You're an idiot, Steve Harrington.
Meet me at Dearborn and Maple at 8:00.
translation.it: Vieni a prendermi all'incrocio tra Dearborn e Maple, alle 20:00.

translation.en: To study.
Good of you to show.
[Hopper slurring] Oh, hey, morning, Flo. Morning, everybody.
-Hey, Chief. -Damn! You look like hell, Chief.
translation.it: - Buongiorno, capo. - Accidenti! Hai un aspetto orribile.

translation.en: Well, I looked better than your wife when I left her this morning.
translation.it: Tua moglie stava peggio, quando l'ho lasciata stamattina.

translation.en: While you were drinking or sleeping,
or whatever it is you deemed so necessary on Monday morning,
translation.it: o facevi non so cosa di tanto importante di lunedì mattina,

translation.en: Phil Larson called.
Said some kids are stealing the gnomes out of his garden again.
translation.it: Dei ragazzini gli stanno rubando i nanetti da giardino.

translation.en: Oh, those garden gnomes again.
Well, I'll tell you what, I'm gonna get right on that.
translation.it: Va bene. Me ne occupo subito.

translation.en: On a more pressing matter,
Joyce Byers can't find her son this morning.
translation.it: Joyce Byers non riesce a trovare il figlio.

translation.en: [muffled] Mmm. Okay, I'm gonna get on that.
translation.it: Joyce Byers non riesce a trovare il figlio. Me ne occupo subito.

translation.en: -Just give me a minute. -Joyce is very upset.
translation.it: - Dammi un minuto. - Joyce è molto turbata.

translation.en: Well, Flo, Flo, we've discussed this.
Mornings are for coffee and contemplation.
translation.it: Le mattine sono fatte per il caffè e la contemplazione.

translation.en: -Chief, she's already in your-- -Coffee and contemplation, Flo!
translation.it: - Capo, è già nel tuo... - Caffè e contemplazione, Flo!

translation.en: I have been waiting here over an hour, Hopper.
translation.it: Ti aspetto da più di un'ora, Hopper.

translation.en: [sighs deeply] And I apologize again.
I'm going out of my mind!
Look, boy his age, he's probably just playing hookie, okay?
translation.it: Un ragazzino di quell'età avrà deciso di marinare la scuola.

translation.en: No, not my Will. He's not like that.
translation.it: Non il mio Will. Lui non è così.

translation.en: -He wouldn't do that. -Well, you never know.
I mean, my mom thought I was on the debate team,
translation.it: Mia madre mi credeva al club di oratoria

translation.en: when really I was just screwing Chrissy Carpenter
translation.it: mentre io mi facevo Chrissy Carpenter

translation.en: in the back of my dad's Oldsmobile, so...
Look, he's not like you, Hopper. He's not like me.
translation.it: Will non è come te, Hopper. Né come me.

translation.en: He's not like... most.
He has a couple of friends, but, you know, the kids, they're mean.
translation.it: Ha un paio di amici, ma i ragazzini sanno essere molto cattivi, lo sai.

translation.en: They make fun of him. They call him names.
-They laugh at him, his clothes-- -His clothes?
translation.it: - Ridono di come si veste... - Di come si veste?

translation.en: -What's wrong with his clothes? -I don't know.
-Does that matter? -Maybe.
Look, he's... He's a sensitive kid.
translation.it: Will è un ragazzino molto sensibile.

translation.en: Lonnie... [sighs] Lonnie used to say he was queer.
translation.it: Lonnie... diceva che per lui era gay.

translation.en: [softy] Called him a fag.
-Is he? -He's missing is what he is.
translation.it: - E lo è? - È sparito. Ecco cos'è.

translation.en: When was the last time you heard from Lonnie?
translation.it: Quand'è stata l'ultima volta che hai parlato con Lonnie?

translation.en: Uh, last I heard, he was in Indianapolis. That was about a year ago.
translation.it: Un anno fa. Era a Indianapolis.

translation.en: -But he has nothing to do with this. -Why don't you give me his number?
translation.it: - Ma lui non c'entra. - Mi dai il suo numero di telefono?

translation.en: You know, Hopper, he has nothing to do with this. Trust me.
Joyce, 99 out of 100 times, kid goes missing,
translation.it: Joyce, in 99 casi su 100, quando un bambino sparisce,

translation.en: the kid is with a parent or relative.
translation.it: è con un genitore o un parente.

translation.en: [stammers] What about the other time?
-What? -You said, "99 out of 100."
-What about the other time, the one? -Joyce.
translation.it: - Che mi dici del 100° caso? - Joyce.

translation.en: The one!
-Joyce, this is Hawkins, okay? -[sighs]
You wanna know the worst thing that's ever happened here in the four years I've been working here? Do you wanna know the worst thing?
translation.it: Sai qual è il caso peggiore che ho avuto in quattro anni che lavoro qui?

translation.en: It was when an owl attacked Eleanor Gillespie's head
translation.it: Un gufo si è avventato sulla testa di Eleanor Gillespie,

translation.en: because it thought that her hair was a nest.
translation.it: scambiando i suoi capelli per un nido.

translation.en: Okay, fine. I will call Lonnie.
He will talk to me before he talks to--
translation.it: Parlerà più facilmente con me che...

translation.en: -What, a pig? -A cop!
translation.it: - Con un piedipiatti? - Con un agente!

translation.en: [voice breaking] Just find my son, Hop.
Find him!
[man] Dr. Brenner.
[scientist] This way, gentlemen.
The entire east wing will be evacuated within the hour.
translation.it: L'ala est sarà evacuata completamente nel giro di un'ora.

translation.en: We've sealed off this area following quarantine protocol.
translation.it: Abbiamo isolato quest'area come indicato nel protocollo di quarantena.

translation.en: [man 1] This is where it came from? [man 2] Yes.
[man 1] And the girl?
She can't have gone far.
[Ben] All right, and one more.
[man] Hey, Ben. What do you think about that, uh... Hey, I don't know. I don't know.
translation.it: - Ben, che ne pensi di quel... - Non lo so.

translation.en: [man] I don't know, 37 points per game average--
translation.it: Con una media di 37 punti a partita...

translation.en: [Ben] Thirty-seven now, but... [man] Mr. Basket.
Come here!
Hey, come here!
You think you can steal from me, boy?
What in the hell?
-[bell ringing] -[Mr. Clarke] Remember, finish chapter 12
and answer 12.3 on the difference between an experiment
translation.it: e di rispondere alla domanda 12.3 sulla differenza tra esperimento

translation.en: and other forms of science investigation.
translation.it: e altre forme di indagine scientifica.

translation.en: This will be on the test, which will cover chapters 10 through 12.
translation.it: Questo sarà nel compito, che riguarderà i capitoli 10, 11 e 12

translation.en: [trailing off] It will be multiple choice with an essay section.
translation.it: e comprenderà domande a risposta multipla e una a risposta libera.

translation.en: So, did it come?
Sorry, boys.
I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but...
it came.
The Heathkit ham shack. [Mike] Whoa. [Mr. Clarke] Ain't she a beaut?
translation.it: Il baracchino Heathkit. Non è una bellezza?

translation.en: I bet you can talk to New York on this thing.
translation.it: Con questo, potremo parlare persino con New York.

translation.en: Think bigger.
-California? -Bigger.
translation.it: - Con la California? - Ancora più in grande.

translation.en: Australia?
-[boys exclaiming] -[Lucas] Oh, man!
When Will sees this, he's totally gonna blow his shit.
translation.it: Quando Will lo vedrà, andrà fuori di testa, cazzo.

translation.en: -Sorry. -[Dustin chuckles]
[in Australian accent] Hello, this is Mike Wheeler, president of Hawkins Middle AV Club.
translation.it: Ciao. Sono Mike Wheeler, presidente dell'Hawkins Middle AV Club.

translation.en: [Lucas] What are you doing?
[in Australian accent] Hello, this is Dustin,
and this is the secretary and treasurer of Hawkins Middle AV Club.
translation.it: segretario e tesoriere dell'Hawkins Middle AV Club.

translation.en: Do you eat kangaroos for breakfast?
Sorry to interrupt, but, uh, may I borrow Michael, Lucas and Dustin?
translation.it: Scusi l'interruzione. Posso rubarle un attimo Michael, Lucas e Dustin?

translation.en: One at a time, all right? You.
-You said he takes what? -Mirkwood.
translation.it: - Da dove dici che passa? - Da Bosco Atro.

translation.en: -Mirkwood? -Yeah.
-Have you ever heard of Mirkwood? -I have not. That sounds made up to me.
translation.it: - Mai sentito "Bosco Atro"? - No. Sembra inventato.

translation.en: No, it's from Lord of the Rings.
translation.it: No, è preso da Il Signore degli Anelli.

translation.en: -Well, The Hobbit. -It doesn't matter.
translation.it: - Veramente, da Lo Hobbit. - Non importa.

translation.en: -He asked! -[mockingly] "He asked!"
-[Mike] Shut up, guys! -Hey, hey, hey!
-What'd I just say? -Shut up.
One at a damn time. You.
Mirkwood, it's a real road. It's just the name that's made up.
translation.it: Bosco Atro è una strada vera. Solo il nome è inventato.

translation.en: It's where Cornwallis and Kerley meet.
translation.it: È all'incrocio tra Cornwallis e Kerley.

translation.en: -Yeah, all right, I think I know that-- -We can show you, if you want.
translation.it: - Ho capito... - Gliela mostriamo, se vuole.

translation.en: I said that I know it!
-We can help look. -Yeah.
translation.it: - La aiuteremo a cercare Will. - Sì.

translation.en: No. After school, you are all to go home.
translation.it: Finita la scuola, dovete tornare tutti a casa.

translation.en: Immediately.
That means no biking around looking for your friend, no investigating,
translation.it: Quindi niente giri in bicicletta a cercare il vostro amico, a fare indagini

translation.en: no nonsense.
This isn't some Lord of the Rings book.
translation.it: Non siamo ne Il Signore degli Anelli.

translation.en: -The Hobbit. -Shut up!
-Hey! -[Mike] Stop it!
[softly] Do I make myself clear?
Do I make myself... clear?
[Mike and Dustin] Yes, sir. [Lucas] Yeah.
Anybody home?
[Will] Password?
Uh, Rada...
[stammering] Radaga-- Radagast?
[Will] Yeah. You may enter.
[Joyce] Thank you, sir.
So, guess what?
I got off early and...
Ta-da! Poltergeist.
I... I thought I wasn't allowed to see it.
translation.it: Credevo non mi permettessi di vederlo.

translation.en: I changed my mind.
As long as you don't have nightmares for a week.
No, I won't. I don't get scared like that anymore.
translation.it: Non li avrò. Non ho più certe paure.

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
Not even of clowns?
What about my witch?
-No. Mom... -Ooh...
-I'm not five anymore. -But Will Byers...
translation.it: - Non ho più cinque anni. - Ma Will Byers...

translation.en: -I'm going to cook you up in my-- -Stop. That's so stupid. Mom!
translation.it: - Ti cucinerò... - Smettila, è stupido. Mamma!

translation.en: [Jonathan] Will?
Where are you?
Geez.
Your parents forget to feed you?
translation.it: I tuoi genitori non ti danno da mangiare?

translation.en: Is that why you ran away?
They, uh...
They hurt you?
You went to the hospital, you got scared,
translation.it: Sei finita in ospedale, ti sei spaventata

translation.en: you ran off, you wound up here, is that it?
All right.
I'll give this back, all right? And you can have as much as you want.
translation.it: Te lo restituisco tra poco. E potrai averne quanti ne vuoi.

translation.en: All right? Maybe even some ice cream.
translation.it: Forse ti darò anche del gelato.

translation.en: But you gotta answer a few of my questions first, all right?
translation.it: Ma prima devi rispondere a qualche domanda.

translation.en: We got a deal?
All right, let's start with the easy stuff. All right?
My name's Benny. Benny Hammond.
See? Like this. Here.
I got you. Don't worry. It's okay.
Nice to meet you, yeah. And you are?
translation.it: Piacere di conoscerti. Tu come ti chiami?

translation.en: Eleven?
What's that mean?
-No. -Well, I'll be damned.
She speaks.
"No"? No, what?
[clicks tongue] All right. I guess no more food, then.
Eleven.
What's it mean?
Eleven.
All right, then.
[chuckles] Here you go.
Take it easy, take it easy.
Yeah, look, all I know is that she's scared to death.
translation.it: So soltanto che è terrorizzata. EMERGENZE SERVIZI SOCIALI

translation.en: Yeah, I think maybe she's been abused or... kidnapped or something.
translation.it: Deve aver subito abusi o essere stata rapita.

translation.en: Yeah, it'd be great if someone would come by.
translation.it: Sì, sarebbe meglio se venisse qualcuno.

translation.en: Yeah, we're at 4819 Randolph Lane. Yeah, Randolph.
translation.it: Siamo al 4819 di Randolph Lane. Esatto.

translation.en: [Callahan] Will Byers?
[Powell yelling] Will!
[Callahan] Will Byers?
Come on, kid!
[Powell] Will?
-[Powell whistles] -Hey! I got something.
-That his bike? -Yeah, he must have crashed.
translation.it: - È la sua bicicletta? - Sì. Deve essere caduto.

translation.en: [Callahan] You think he got hurt in the fall?
translation.it: Pensi che si sia fatto male?

translation.en: Not so hurt he couldn't walk away.
translation.it: Non tanto da non potersene andare.

translation.en: Bike like this is like a Cadillac to these kids.
translation.it: Questa bici è la Cadillac dei bambini.

translation.en: He would've walked it home.
translation.it: L'avrebbe riportata a casa a spinta.

translation.en: [woman 1] ...get off work if I win.
[woman 2] Oh, Friday I'm supposed to...
[woman 3] ...but we will cover whatever the damages are to your property.
translation.it: ...ma pagheremo i danni alla sua proprietà.

translation.en: -It's just, um... -[woman 4] That's for sure.
-[overlapping conversations] -[line ringing]
translation.it: Forse la cosa migliore per voi...

translation.en: [Joyce] Is Lonnie there?
[woman] Lonnie isn't here right now. [Joyce] Can you please--
translation.it: - Lonnie non è in casa. - Potrebbe...

translation.en: -I told you, Lonnie's not here. -Who is this?
translation.it: - Le ho detto che non c'è. - Chi parla?

translation.en: -His girlfriend, Cynthia. -Cynthia.
translation.it: - Sono la sua ragazza, Cynthia. - Cynthia.

translation.en: -Who the hell is this? -Cynthia, this is Joyce.
translation.it: - Tu chi diavolo sei? - Sono Joyce.

translation.en: -Who? -Lonnie's ex-wife.
-I really need to speak to him-- -Lonnie's not here.
translation.it: - Ho bisogno di parlargli... - Non c'è.

translation.en: -Can you please put-- No! -Why don't you call back later?
No, not later. Now! -Can-- -[line disconnects]
translation.it: No, non più tardi. Adesso! Potresti...

translation.en: -Bitch! -[Jonathan] Mom.
-What? -You have to stay calm.
[Lonnie] Hey, you've reached Lonnie.
Leave a message and I'll holler right back at ya.
translation.it: Lasciate un messaggio e vi richiamerò.

translation.en: Lonnie, some teenager just hung up on me.
translation.it: Lonnie, un'adolescente mi ha riattaccato in faccia.

translation.en: Will is... is missing. I don't know where he is.
translation.it: Will è sparito. Non so dove sia.

translation.en: [voice breaking] I need...
I just need you to call me back, please, just--
-Damn it! Damn it! -[car approaching]
-[sighs deeply] -Mom? What?
Cops.
-It was just lying there? -Yeah. Cal?
translation.it: - La bici era per terra? - Sì. Cal?

translation.en: -Did it have any blood on it, or-- -No, no, no, no, no...
translation.it: - Ha sopra tracce di sangue o... - No.

translation.en: If you found the bike out there, why are you here?
translation.it: Se avete trovato la bici nel bosco, perché siete qui?

translation.en: -Well, he had a key to the house, right? -[Jonathan] Yeah.
translation.it: - Will aveva le chiavi di casa, vero? - Sì.

translation.en: So...
maybe he came home.
[stammers] You think I didn't check my own house?
translation.it: Pensi che non l'abbia cercato in casa?

translation.en: I'm not saying that.
-Has this always been here? -[Joyce] What? I don't know.
translation.it: - Questo c'è sempre stato? - Cosa? Non lo so.

translation.en: Probably. I mean, I have two boys. Look at this place.
translation.it: È probabile. Ho due figli maschi. Guarda com'è ridotta la casa.

translation.en: You're not sure?
Hey, what's up with this guy, huh?
Nothing, he's probably just hungry. Come on.
-[Callahan] Hey! -Jesus!
What are you, deaf? I've been calling you.
-[exhales] -What's going on?
Hello?
-Are you sure you're okay, Chief? -Listen, I want you to call Flo.
translation.it: - Sicuro di stare bene, capo? - Chiama Flo.

translation.en: I want to get a search party together, all right?
translation.it: Dille di formare una squadra di ricerca.

translation.en: All the volunteers she can muster. Bring flashlights, too.
translation.it: Tutti i volontari che trova. E che portino delle torce.

translation.en: [Callahan] Hey, you think we got a problem here?
[Mike] We should be out there right now. We should be helping look for him.
translation.it: Dovremmo essere fuori a dare una mano con le ricerche.

translation.en: We've been over this, Mike. The chief says--
translation.it: Sai bene che il capo ha detto...

translation.en: -I don't care what the chief said. -Michael!
We have to do something. Will can be in danger.
More reason to stay put.
translation.it: Ragione in più per stare qui.

translation.en: -Mom! -End of discussion.
So... me and Barbara are gonna study at her house tonight.
translation.it: Allora... io vado a studiare a casa di Barbara, stasera.

translation.en: -That's cool, right? -No, not cool.
translation.it: - Va bene, vero? - No, non va bene.

translation.en: What? Why not?
Why do you think? Am I speaking Chinese in this house?
translation.it: Tu che pensi? Parlo forse cinese e nessuno mi capisce?

translation.en: Until we know Will is okay, no one leaves.
translation.it: Finché non sapremo che Will sta bene, nessuno esce di casa.

translation.en: -This is such bullshit. -Language.
So we're under house arrest?
Just because Mike's friend got lost on the way home from...
translation.it: solo perché il suo amico si è perso...

translation.en: -Wait, this is Will's fault? -Nancy, take that back.
translation.it: - Ora è colpa di Will? - Ritira ciò che hai detto.

translation.en: -No! -You're just pissed off
'cause you wanna hang out with Steve.
-Steve? -Who is Steve?
-Her new boyfriend. -You are such a douchebag, Mike!
translation.it: - Il suo nuovo ragazzo. - Sei un vero stronzo, Mike!

translation.en: -Language! -[groans]
Nancy, come back.
[sighs] It's okay. It's okay, Holly. Here, have some juice, okay?
translation.it: Va tutto bene, Holly. Bevi un po' di succo di frutta.

translation.en: You see, Michael?
-You see what happens? -[shouting] What happens when what?
translation.it: - Vedi cosa succede? - Cosa succede a fare cosa?

translation.en: I'm the only one acting normal here! I'm the only one that cares about Will!
translation.it: Sono l'unico normale, qui! L'unico a cui importi di Will!

translation.en: That is really unfair, son.
We care.
translation.it: Anche a noi importa di lui.

translation.en: -Mike! -Let him go.
I hope you're enjoying your chicken, Ted.
translation.it: Spero che tu ti stia gustando il pollo, Ted.

translation.en: What did I do?
Hey! What'd I do?
[boy] Will! [man 1] Will Byers!
[man 2] Will!
[woman] Will, we're here for you, bud!
[Mr. Clarke] He's a good student.
-[Hopper] What? -Will. He's a good student.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Will. È bravo a scuola.

translation.en: Great one, actually.
I don't think we've met. Scott Clarke.
translation.it: Non credo che ci conosciamo. Scott Clarke.

translation.en: Teacher, Hawkins Middle. Earth and biology.
translation.it: Insegnante della Hawkins Middle School. Geologia e biologia.

translation.en: [Hopper] I always had a distaste for science.
translation.it: Le scienze non mi sono mai piaciute.

translation.en: [Mr. Clarke] Well, maybe you had a bad teacher.
translation.it: Forse non ha avuto un buon insegnante.

translation.en: [Hopper] Yeah, Ms. Ratliff was a piece of work.
translation.it: Già. La sig.ra Ratliff era una strega.

translation.en: [Mr. Clarke chuckles] Ratliff? You bet.
She's still kicking around, believe it or not.
translation.it: È ancora in giro, che ci creda o no.

translation.en: [Hopper] Oh, I believe it. Mummies never die, so they tell me.
translation.it: Ci credo eccome. Le mummie sono immortali, a quanto dicono.

translation.en: Sarah, my daughter...
Galaxies, the universe, whatnot... She always understood all that stuff.
translation.it: Galassie, universo, tutta quella roba... Lei l'ha sempre capita al volo.

translation.en: I always figured there was enough going on down here,
translation.it: Per me, è già abbastanza ciò che succede sulla Terra.

translation.en: I never needed to look elsewhere.
translation.it: Non ho bisogno di cercare altrove.

translation.en: [Mr. Clarke] Your daughter, what grade is she?
-Maybe I'll get her in my class. -No, she, uh...
translation.it: - Potrei farla ammettere nella mia classe. - No, lei...

translation.en: She lives with her mom in the city.
translation.it: ...vive con sua madre in un'altra città.

translation.en: Thanks for coming out, Teach. We really appreciate it.
translation.it: Grazie di partecipare alle ricerche. Lo apprezziamo molto.

translation.en: -She died a few years back. -Sorry?
translation.it: - È morta alcuni anni fa. - Prego?

translation.en: His kid.
Lucas, do you copy? It's Mike.
-Lucas? -Hey, it's Lucas.
I know it's you.
And say "over" when you're done talking so I know when you're done. Over.
translation.it: E di' "passo" quando finisci di parlare, così so che hai finito. Passo.

translation.en: I'm done. Over.
I'm worried about Will. Over.
This is crazy. Over.
I was thinking...
Will could've cast Protection last night, but he didn't.
translation.it: Will poteva usare un incantesimo di protezione, ieri sera,

translation.en: He cast Fireball.
-Over. -What's your point? Over.
My point is... he could've played it safe, but he didn't.
translation.it: Voglio dire che poteva andare sul sicuro, ma non l'ha fatto.

translation.en: He put himself in danger to help the party.
translation.it: Ha preferito rischiare per aiutare il gruppo.

translation.en: Over.
Meet me in ten. Over and out.
translation.it: Vediamoci tra dieci minuti. Passo e chiudo.

translation.en: [whispers] What are you doing here?
I told you on the phone, I'm under house arrest now.
translation.it: Ti ho detto che sono agli arresti domiciliari.

translation.en: -I figured we'd just study here. -No. No way.
translation.it: - Pensavo di studiare con te qui. - No, non se ne parla.

translation.en: Oh, come on. I can't have you failing this test.
translation.it: Non permetterò che il compito ti vada male.

translation.en: So just... bear with me.
What'd I tell you?
Ninja.
You like that ice cream, huh?
Smile looks good on you.
translation.it: Sei più carina con il sorriso.

translation.en: You know, smile?
All right. You just sit tight.
Whoever it is, I'll tell 'em to go away real quick, all right?
translation.it: Torno subito. Chiunque sia, gli dirò di andarsene, va bene?

translation.en: -Hey, can I help you? -Hi, you must be Benny Hammond.
translation.it: - Posso aiutarla? - Lei deve essere Benny Hammond.

translation.en: I'm afraid I am. I'm afraid we're closed for the evening, too.
translation.it: Temo di sì. Ma siamo chiusi.

translation.en: -So try back tomorrow morning. -Connie Frazier. Social Services.
translation.it: - Torni domani mattina. - Connie Frazier, servizi sociali.

translation.en: Ah, Social Services. My apologies. I didn't expect you so soon.
translation.it: Servizi sociali. Mi scusi. Non l'aspettavo così presto.

translation.en: -That's a heck of a drive. -Not too bad this time of night.
translation.it: - Il viaggio è lungo fin qui. - C'è poco traffico a quest'ora.

translation.en: Hey, listen, I... I haven't told her that you're coming yet.
translation.it: Non ho ancora parlato di lei alla bambina.

translation.en: I didn't want her running off again. She's a tad skittish.
translation.it: Non volevo che scappasse di nuovo. È molto diffidente.

translation.en: -Children I work with usually are. -Right, right.
translation.it: - Come tutti i bambini con cui lavoro. - Giusto.

translation.en: -So, where is she? -Right. She's in the kitchen.
-Come on up. I'll introduce you. -Thank you.
Sorry again for trying to turn you away there.
translation.it: Scusi ancora se ho cercato di mandarla via.

translation.en: -It's fine. -You know, it's funny.
-Your, uh, voice sounds different on the-- -[silenced gunshot]
translation.it: La sua voce è diversa al telefono...

translation.en: [Lucas] Ah, man. This is it.
Hey, guys. You feel that?
-I think maybe we should go back. -No.
We're not going back. Just stay close.
translation.it: Non torneremo indietro. Ma stiamo uniti.

translation.en: Come on.
Just stay on channel six. Don't do anything stupid.
translation.it: Restate sul canale sei. E niente stupidaggini.

translation.en: Hey, guys, wait up.
[Steve] "Which polymers occur naturally?"
Starch and cellulose.
"In a molecule of CH4, the hydrogen atoms are spatially oriented
translation.it: "In una molecola di CH4, gli atomi di idrogeno sono orientati

translation.en: -towards the centers of--" -Tetrahedrons.
Wow. Jesus, how many of these did you make?
translation.it: Caspita. Ma quante ne hai scritte?

translation.en: You said you wanted to help.
How about this? How about...
How about every time that you get something right,
I have to take off an item of clothing.
But every time that you get something wrong--
translation.it: Ma ogni volta che rispondi male...

translation.en: -Uh, pass. -Oh, come on.
-Come on. It'll be fun. -No.
"During fractional distillation,
hydrocarbons are separated according to their--"
translation.it: gli idrocarburi si separano in base al loro..."

translation.en: Melting point.
Ooh, it's boiling points.
That's what I meant.
Yeah, that's not what you said.
translation.it: Sì, ma hai detto un'altra cosa.

translation.en: Oh, do you need... Do you need help, or...
[whispers] Steve. Steve, come on.
What?
Are you crazy? My parents are here.
translation.it: Sei matto? Ci sono i miei genitori.

translation.en: That's weird, I... don't see them.
Was this your plan all along? To... to get in my room and then...
translation.it: Era questo il tuo piano? Infilarti nella mia stanza per...

translation.en: -get another notch on your belt. -No. Nancy, no.
translation.it: - ...fare un'altra tacca sul fucile? - No, Nancy.

translation.en: I'm not Laurie, or Amy, or Becky.
translation.it: Non sono Laurie, Amy o Becky.

translation.en: You mean, you're not a slut.
translation.it: Intendi che non sei una facile.

translation.en: That's not what I'm saying.
translation.it: Non è ciò che ho detto.

translation.en: You know, you're so cute when you lie.
Shut up.
Bad Steve.
[groans] Bad. Don't do that to Miss Nancy...
translation.it: Molto cattivo. Non si tratta così la sig.na Nancy.

translation.en: You're an idiot, Steve Harrington.
You are beautiful, Nancy Wheeler.
translation.it: E tu sei bellissima, Nancy Wheeler.

translation.en: "Compared to the rate of inorganic reactions,
the rate of organic reactions is generally..."
translation.it: il tasso di reazioni organiche è generalmente..."

translation.en: [Joyce] Jonathan, wow. You took these?
translation.it: Jonathan, caspita. Le hai scattate tu?

translation.en: These are great.
[sniffling] Wow, they really are.
I know I haven't been there for you. [stammers] I've been...
translation.it: So che non ti sono stata molto vicina. Ho sempre...

translation.en: working so hard and I...
I just feel bad. I don't even...
barely know what's going on with you. [chuckles]
translation.it: So a stento cosa fai, cosa ti interessa.

translation.en: All right? I am sorry about that.
Hey, what is it?
What is it, honey?
-Nothing. [sniffles] -Tell me. Tell me.
-Come on. You can... -No.
It's just...
[voice breaking] I should've been there for him.
[hoarsely] No. Oh, no. You can't do that to yourself.
This was not your fault. Do you hear me?
translation.it: Non è colpa tua. Hai capito?

translation.en: He is... close. I know it. [stammers] I...
translation.it: Will è... vicino. Lo so. Io...

translation.en: I feel it in my heart. [sniffles]
You just have to... You have to trust me on this, okay?
translation.it: Devi fidarti di me, va bene?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Oh, look at this.
Look at this one. Look at this one.
-I mean, that's it, right? -Yeah.
[hoarsely] That's it. That's the one.
-Hello? -[static on phone]
-Dad? -Hopper?
-[muffled breathing on phone] -Who is this?
-Will? -It's Will?
-[sobs] -Mom, it's Will?
-[yelling] Who is this? -[indistinct growling]
-[yelling] What have you done to my boy? -What? What?
translation.it: - Cos'hai fatto a mio figlio? - Cosa?

translation.en: Give me back my son!
-[groans] -Hello? Hello, who is this?
-Mom, who was it? Who was it, Mom? -[muttering incoherently]
-[sobbing] It was him. -Look at me, Mom. Was it Will?
-Yes. -What did he say?
[sobbing] He just breathed. He just breathed.
-[Jonathan] And was someone else there? -I...
translation.it: - C'era qualcun altro con lui? - Io...

translation.en: -Mom, who was there? Who was it? -It was him.
translation.it: - Mamma, chi era al telefono? - Era lui.

translation.en: I know it was his breathing. I know it was his breathing.
translation.it: Era il suo respiro. Ne sono certa.

translation.en: -[thunder rumbling] -[Mike] Will!
-Will! -[Lucas] Byers!
[Dustin] I've got your X-Men 134!
Guys, I really think we should turn back.
[Lucas] Seriously, Dustin?
You wanna be a baby, then go home already!
translation.it: Se vuoi fare il poppante, tornatene pure a casa.

translation.en: I'm just being realistic, Lucas!
No, you're just being a big sissy!
[Dustin] Did you ever think Will went missing because he ran into something bad?
translation.it: Non credete che Will sia sparito perché gli è capitato qualcosa di brutto?

translation.en: And we're going to the exact same spot where he was last seen?
translation.it: Stiamo andando proprio dov'è stato visto per l'ultima volta.

translation.en: -And we have no weapons or anything? -Dustin, shut up.
translation.it: - Senza armi né niente. - Zitto, Dustin.

translation.en: I'm just saying, does that seem smart to you?
-Shut up. Shut up. -[rustling]
Did you guys hear that?
